channel.title: How to make a bow shoot arrows?
channel.description:
ok i recently added a flame bow to my server
does anyone know how i can make it shoot arrows?

item.title: How to make a bow shoot arrows?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“tubefish, post:3, topic:349518”]yea im not very good at coding

is there a tutorial out there that shows how to make it shoot arrows?[/quote]

No. Not everything in life has a tutorial. It’s simple if you actually try and look at it…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a bow shoot arrows?

item.title: How to make a bow shoot arrows?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There will be a lot of places that need to be edited to work with a new bow. Search for a different bow, such as the magic shortbow (ID is 861), and edit the code to include the flame bow.

Read full topic
